scripts.lint: eslint index.js App.js app test --fix --ext .js,.ts,.tsx && yarn format
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.release:ios: echo 'Not implemented yet: release:ios. Use Xcode. More info: https://reactnative.dev/docs/next/publishing-to-app-store'
scripts.release:android: cd android && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-* && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd - && echo 'APK generated in ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk'
scripts.adb: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && adb reverse tcp:3000 tcp:3000 && adb reverse tcp:9001 tcp:9001 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.pod: cd ios && arch -x86_64 pod install && cd ..
